scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules
scripts.watch: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --progress --hide-modules
scripts.watch-poll: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --watch --watch-poll --progress --hide-modules
scripts.hot: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node_modules/webpack-dev-server/bin/webpack-dev-server.js --inline --hot
scripts.production: npm run cleanup && npm run ngc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --progress --hide-modules
